creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip fund
description: abstracted form of an erupting volcano at bottom, in purple-brown, overlapping a black band; dreamy background of dark gray, brown, and purple; triangular shape entering plane at R; two irregular lines overlapping scene at L and one at R; built-up layers of cloth tape at corners, with a few pieces along edge
medium: Cloth adhesive tape and resin on laminated chromogenic analog print mounted on wooden panel
title: Retina #27 (Active Volcano)
